abstract: Mukesh and Anil Ambani, the world’s richest siblings, said they hoped to negotiate a deal soon for natural gas supplies.
snippet: Mukesh and Anil Ambani, the world’s richest siblings, said they hoped to negotiate a deal soon for natural gas supplies.
lead_paragraph: India’s estranged billionaire Ambani brothers, who split the family’s business empire, said on Sunday that they had ended noncompetition agreements that had been a source of bitter dispute.

headline.main: In India, Billionaire Brothers End Dispute
headline.print_headline: In India, Billionaire Brothers End Dispute

abstract: The financial reform legislation making its way through Congress has Wall Street executives privately relieved that the bill does not do more to fundamentally change how the industry does business.
snippet: The financial reform legislation making its way through Congress has Wall Street executives privately relieved that the bill does not do more to fundamentally change how the industry does business.
lead_paragraph: The financial reform legislation making its way through Congress has Wall Street executives privately relieved that the bill does not do more to fundamentally change how the industry does business, Eric Dash and Nelson D. Schwartz report in The New York Times.

headline.main: As Reform Takes Shape, Some Relief on Wall Street
